ingredients.content: 1 lime, thin peelings of skin and juice
250 g fresh raspberries, plus extra for garnish

preparations.content: Place lime peel and sugar in mixing bowl then grind <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>.
Add raspberries and lime juice then chop <b>Turbo/0.5 sec/3 times<b>. Scrape down sides and lid of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add ice cream and blend <b>30 sec/speed 9<b> while stirring with spatula through hole in mixing bowl lid. Serve immediately, garnished with fresh raspberries.
